| History                 = The Red Hand Commando were a loyalist paramilitary group (Protestants), that warred with the republican paramilitary groups (the Catholics). As the fighting continued, they realized that they needed financing to carry on the fight. Like the other paramilitaries groups, they turned to smuggling cocaine for the Colombians and within Belfast itself the drug trade, prostitution, loan-sharking, and pornography. Since the ceasefire, the political conflict mutated into a gang war over territory.{{r|Punisher Vol 6 18}}
